fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Enlargement, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Banking and financial services, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives: EU budgetary policy, fiscal policy oversight of member countries, rule of law (i.e. investment climate) in specific member countries, EU foreign policy, trade policy, etc.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
USA FINRA (Financial Industry Regulatory Authority)

position: Managing Director - head of sovereign research
goals__remit: TCW is an investment management business with significant investments in many EU countries, mainly marketable securities such as government bonds, corporate bonds, and equities.  To understand better the EU investment outlook, from time to time we meet with EU officials to discuss the macroeconomic and policy outlook across the EU and in individual EU member countries.
